entry.title: Android Edittext动态监听字符
entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
android:layout_width="fill_parent"
android:layout_height="fill_parent"
android:background="@color/contentbg">

<LinearLayout
    android:id="@+id/title_bar_layout"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:orientation="vertical">

    <RelativeLayout
        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
        android:layout_height="45dp"
        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
        android:background="@color/green">

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/title_left_btn"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_centerVertical="true"
            android:layout_marginLeft="15dp"
            android:text="取消"
            android:textColor="@color/title_bg"
            android:textSize="14sp" />

        <LinearLayout
            android:id="@+id/ll_channel_create"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="30dip"
            android:layout_centerInParent="true"
            android:gravity="center"
            android:visibility="gone">

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/title_text"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
                android:gravity="center_vertical|right"
                android:textColor="#ffffff"
                android:textSize="17sp" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_community"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
                android:background="@drawable/community_down" />
        </LinearLayout>

        <TextView
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
            android:layout_centerVertical="true"
            android:text="新动态"
            android:textColor="@color/title_bg"
            android:textSize="14sp" />

        <Button
            android:id="@+id/title_right_btn"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="27dip"
            android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
            android:layout_centerVertical="true"
            android:background="@null"
            android:onClick="onRightBtnClick"
            android:text="发布"
            android:textColor="@color/title_bg"
            android:textSize="14sp" />

        <View
            android:layout_width="fill_parent"
            android:layout_height="1px"
            android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
            android:background="@color/titledividebg" />
    </RelativeLayout>
</LinearLayout>

<com.android.lesdo.view.VerticalScrollview
    android:id="@+id/sv_content"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_below="@id/title_bar_layout"
    android:fillViewport="false">

    <RelativeLayout
        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
        android:layout_height="fill_parent">

        <EditText
            android:id="@+id/et_create_card_title"
            android:layout_width="fill_parent"
            android:layout_height="48dp"
            android:background="@color/white"
            android:gravity="center_vertical"
            android:hint="有标题更吸引人（选填）"
            android:maxEms="25"
            android:maxLength="25"
            android:maxLines="2"
            android:paddingLeft="30dip"
            android:paddingRight="30dip"
            android:textColor="@color/title"
            android:textColorHint="@color/hint"
            android:textSize="13sp" />

        <EditText
            android:id="@+id/et_create_card_content"
            android:layout_width="fill_parent"
            android:layout_height="168dip"
            android:layout_below="@+id/et_create_card_title"
            android:background="@color/white"
            android:gravity="start"
            android:hint="帖子光着好害羞，有图片或文字才能发布"
            android:paddingLeft="30dip"
            android:paddingRight="30dip"
            android:paddingTop="18dp"
            android:textColor="@color/title"
            android:textColorHint="@color/hint"
            android:textSize="13sp" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/mTvAvailableCharNum"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_below="@+id/et_create_card_content"
            android:background="@color/white"
            android:gravity="end"
            android:hint="140/140"
            android:paddingEnd="20dp"
            android:textColor="@color/title"
            android:textColorHint="@color/hint"
            android:textSize="13sp" />

        <View
            android:layout_width="fill_parent"
            android:layout_height="1px"
            android:layout_below="@id/et_create_card_title"
            android:layout_marginLeft="30dip"
            android:layout_marginRight="30dp"
            android:background="@color/bg_card_divider" />

        <RelativeLayout
            android:id="@+id/rl_bottom"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_below="@id/mTvAvailableCharNum"
            android:background="@color/white"
            android:paddingTop="10dip"
            android:visibility="visible">

            <com.android.lesdo.view.NoScrollGridView
                android:id="@+id/gv_create_images"
                android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
                android:background="@color/white"
                android:horizontalSpacing="5dp"
                android:listSelector="@android:color/transparent"
                android:numColumns="4"
                android:paddingLeft="30dip"
                android:paddingRight="30dip"
                android:scrollbars="none"
                android:verticalSpacing="5dp"
                android:visibility="visible" />

            <com.android.lesdo.view.RoundImageView
                android:id="@+id/iv_create_image"
                android:layout_width="65dip"
                android:layout_height="65dip"
                android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
                android:layout_margin="15dip"
                android:src="@drawable/camera_default"
                android:visibility="gone" />

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/tv_image_size"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_alignBottom="@id/iv_create_image"
                android:layout_alignRight="@id/iv_create_image"
                android:background="@drawable/image_count"
                android:padding="2dip"
                android:text="0"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:visibility="gone" />

            <View
                android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                android:layout_height="1px"
                android:layout_below="@+id/gv_create_images"
                android:layout_marginTop="15dip"
                android:background="@color/white"
                android:visibility="visible" />

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/tv_topics"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
                android:paddingBottom="15dip"
                android:paddingRight="15dip"
                android:text="+ 添加话题"
                android:textColor="@color/green"
                android:textSize="17sp"
                android:visibility="gone" />

            <View
                android:id="@+id/guide_buttom_line"
                android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                android:layout_height="1px"
                android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
                android:background="@color/d2d5d7"
                android:visibility="gone" />
        </RelativeLayout>


        <RelativeLayout
            android:id="@+id/rel_guide_top"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:layout_alignBottom="@id/rl_bottom"
            android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:visibility="gone">

            <View
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="300dip"
                android:layout_marginBottom="32px"
                android:background="@color/tweenblack" />

            <ImageView
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="match_parent"
                android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
                android:layout_marginLeft="25dip"
                android:scaleType="fitEnd"
                android:src="@drawable/guide_create_topic" />
        </RelativeLayout>

        <RelativeLayout
            android:id="@+id/rel_guide_bottom"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="300dip"
            android:layout_below="@id/rel_create_topic"
            android:background="@color/tweenblack"
            android:visibility="gone" />

    </RelativeLayout>

</com.android.lesdo.view.VerticalScrollview>

<TextView
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
    android:layout_below="@+id/sv_content"
    android:layout_marginBottom="32dp"
    android:gravity="bottom"
    android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp"
    android:paddingLeft="30dp"
    android:paddingRight="30dp"
    android:text="@string/send_tip"
    android:textColor="@color/prompt"
    android:textSize="10sp" />

</RelativeLayout>

et_create_card_content.addTextChangedListener(new TextWatcher() {
            private CharSequence temp;//监听前的文本
            private int editStart;//光标开始位置
            private int editEnd;//光标结束位置
            private final int charMaxNum = 140;
            private final Boolean DEBUG = true;

            //                    Log.i(TAG, "输入文本之前的状态");
            @Override
            public void beforeTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int count, int after) {
                if (DEBUG)
                    temp = s;
            }

            @Override
            public void onTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int before, int count) {
                if (DEBUG)
//                    Log.i(TAG, "输入文字中的状态，count是一次性输入字符数");
                    mTvAvailableCharNum.setText(s.length() + " / 140");
            }

            @Override
            public void afterTextChanged(Editable s) {
                if (DEBUG)
//                    Log.i(TAG, "输入文字后的状态");
                /** 得到光标开始和结束位置 ,超过最大数后记录刚超出的数字索引进行控制 */
                    editStart = et_create_card_content.getSelectionStart();
                editEnd = et_create_card_content.getSelectionEnd();
                if (temp.length() > charMaxNum) {
                    Toast.makeText(getApplicationContext(), "你输入的字数已经超过了限制！", Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
                    s.delete(editStart - 1, editEnd);
                    int tempSelection = editStart;
                    et_create_card_content.setText(s);
                    et_create_card_content.setSelection(tempSelection);
                }

            }

        });

compile ‘com.tbruyelle.rxpermissions:rxpermissions:0.9.4@aar’

/**

  • Created by lgy on 2017/7/10.
  • RxPermissionsUtil 动态权限申请
    */

public class RxPermissionsUtil {
public static RxPermissions rxPermission;

private static RxPermissions getInstance(Activity activity) {
    if (rxPermission == null) {
        if (rxPermission == null)
            rxPermission = new RxPermissions(activity);
    }
    return rxPermission;
}

public static void isRxPermission(Activity activity) {
    getInstance(activity)
            .request(getPermission())
            .subscribe(new Action1<Boolean>() {
                @Override
                public void call(Boolean aBoolean) {
                    if (aBoolean) {
                        // 所有权限请求被同意
                        //TODO
                    } else {
                        // 至少有一个权限没同意
                    }
                }
            });
}

public static void requestPermissions(Activity activity) {
    getInstance(activity)
            .requestEach(getPermission())
            .subscribe(new Action1<Permission>() {
                @Override
                public void call(Permission permission) {
                    if (permission.granted) {
                        // 用户已经同意该权限
                        Log.d("permissions", permission.name + " is granted.");
                    } else if (permission.shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale) {
                        // 用户拒绝了该权限，没有选中『不再询问』（Never ask again）,那么下次再次启动时，还会提示请求权限的对话框
                        Log.d("permissions", permission.name + " is denied. More info should be provided.");
                    } else {
                        ToastUtils.showLongToast("请手动配置权限");
                        // 用户拒绝了该权限，并且选中『不再询问』
                        Log.d("permissions", permission.name + " is denied.");
                    }
                }
            });


}

@NonNull
private static String[] getPermissions() {
    return new String[]{
            Manifest.permission.SEND_SMS,
            Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE,
            Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION,

            Manifest.permission.READ_SMS,
            Manifest.permission.RECORD_AUDIO,
            Manifest.permission.CAMERA,
            Manifest.permission.CALL_PHONE,
    };
}

@NonNull
private static String[] getPermission() {
    return new String[]{Manifest.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE,    //允许程序读外部存储，如SD卡上写文件
            Manifest.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS,    //写入
            Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE,    //允许程序写入外部存储，如SD卡上写文件
            Manifest.permission.CAMERA    //拍照
    };
}

}
